attributes.action: Sensiblexit: leavers and remainers revoke article 50 for some breathing space.
attributes.background: Sensiblexit: nobody knows what the public, or parliament, or the EU want; so why not buy more time for us ALL to decide - without 'running down the clock' ?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure how you want "us all to decide" about Brexit.

If you would like Article 50 to be revoked followed at some point by a referendum on the UK's future relationship with the EU you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245960
